CustomField.formula: IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "34", "American Express", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "37", "American Express", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 3) = "622", "China Union Pay", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 3) = "624", "China Union Pay", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 3) = "625", "China Union Pay", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 3) = "626", "China Union Pay", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 3) = "628", "China Union Pay", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "30", "Diners Club", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "36", "Diners Club", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 4) = "2014", "Diners Club", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 4) = "2149", "Diners Club", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "35", "JCB", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "51", "Mastercard", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "52", "Mastercard", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "53", "Mastercard", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "54", "Mastercard", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 2) = "55", "Mastercard", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 1) = "4", "Visa", IF(LEFT(Credit_Card_Number__c, 1) = "", "","Unknown")))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Credit Card Type
